mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GOODS( CD ,TITLE ,PRICE ,CONT ,CATE ,FILENAME ,RDATE ,UDATE ) VALUES( goods_seq.nextval ,'${title}' ,'${price}' ,'${cont}' ,'${cate}' ,'${filename}' ,sysdate ,'' )
mapper.select: SELECT B.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM ( SELECT CD ,TITLE ,PRICE ,CONT ,CATE ,FILENAME ,RDATE ,UDATE FROM GOODS ORDER BY CD DESC ) A ) B WHERE RN BETWEEN ${firstIndex} AND ${lastIndex}
